20110117151237.000|20110117151238.000|CC1|I HAVE NO IDEA.                 
20110117151238.000|20110117151241.000|CC1|MY FATHER DID NOT HAVE DEMENTIA.
20110117151241.000|20110117151242.000|CC1|THE FACT THAT HE WAS OVERLOADED

20110117151246.000|20110117151248.000|CC1|THE NEXT DEBATE, HE TOOK MONDALE
20110117151248.000|20110117151249.000|CC1|TO THE CLEANERS ON THAT ONE.
